channel.title: Skillcape Shop Problem
channel.description:
SOURCE: Project Insanity
PROBLEM: If I have money in my invintory and I trade the skill cape shop it freezes the client and I have to restart it. BUT if I DO NOT have any money in my invintory and I trade the skill cape shop the shop works perfectly.
Please help
- thanks Grant
